DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare treatment outcome patient mixed urinary incontinence ( MUI ) therapy initiate surgery therapy initiate non-surgical treatment . Women bother symptom stress urge incontinence randomly assign initiate treatment surgical ( surgery stress incontinence ) vs. non-surgical ( drug behavioral therapy ) approach . Follow-up minimum 12 Months .
DOC.brief_title: Mixed Incontinence : Medical Or Surgical Approach ?
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare treatment outcome patient mixed urinary incontinence ( MUI ) therapy initiate surgery therapy initiate non-surgical treatment . Women bother symptom stress urge incontinence randomly assign initiate treatment surgical ( surgery stress incontinence ) vs. non-surgical ( drug behavioral therapy ) approach . Follow-up minimum 12 Months .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 2 . Mixed UI evidence stress urge symptom report MESA ( either percent urgetype symptom ≥ percent stresstype symptom urge symptom score ≥7 stress predominant ) follow report `` moderately '' `` greatly '' / '' quite bit '' bother question 2 3 6item Urinary Distress Index ( UDI6 ) question 16 17 20item Pelvic Fl ; oor Distress Index ( PFDI20 ) , respectively ( See Appendix C ) 3 . Moderate severe UI evidence correspond response Patient Global Impression Severity ( PGIS ) 4 . Incontinence symptoms present least ( 3 ) months* 5 . Bladder capacity > 200cc ( method ) 6 . Urodynamic Stress Incontinence 7 . Eligible treatment intervention 8 . Available start intervention within 6 week 9 . Negative urine dipstick ( negative result = trace less leukocytes & nitrite ) 10 . Available 12 month followup able complete study assessment per clinician judgment 11 . Signed consent form 1 . Age < 21 years* 2 . Currently undergo recommend undergo treatment pelvic organ prolapse 3 . Other indicated/planned concomitant surgery 4 . Pregnant complete child bearing* 5 . < 12 month postpartum*† 6 . Active malignancy cervix , uterus , fallopian tube ( ) ovary > Stage I , bladder Stage 7 . Current catheter use 8 . Unevaluated hematuria 9 . Participation another trial may influence result study Patient rescreened respective time interval met . † '' Partum '' define delivery termination occur 20 week gestation .
